nodes.text: Darth Vader and Son is a series of non-canon picture books by Jeffrey Brown. The first book of the same name was published on April 18, 2012 and featured Darth Vader parenting Luke Skywalker. Later books in the series would feature similar scenarios, such as Vader parenting Leia Organa.
Rey and Pals, while not focusing on Darth Vader, was also written by Brown and features the same art style and book structure.
